title: Why do we need Historians? - Quora

response.answer_text: "those who don't learn from history are doomed to repeat it" George Santayana,and by golly we have a dark pastCategory:Lists of wars by datewe need to analyse history and learn from it to ensure our own survival.
We need to understand history to understand our present and future. Of course for that we need historians who are politically unbiased and who can paint neutral pictures.
